It might be just your imagination, but you can hear
a faint sound from the other side of the door...
You hear faint breathing from inside...
The stone is radiating faint blue light.
You could \c[2]Devour\c[0] the remains of the dead guard.
You could use \c[2]Demon seed\c[0] on the dead guard.
A baby sprouted out of your seed!
You take the baby with you.

Map001.Event[37].Page[0].list.message[0]: Awful smell comes from all the rotten meat on
the table! Plates are covered with maggots.
Map001.Event[37].Page[0].list.message[1]: It does make you wonder if someone actually eats this
stuff. After all, why have them here otherwise?
Map001.Event[37].Page[0].list.message[3]: You take some \c[2]Rotten meat\c[0] with you.

Map001.Event[73].Page[0].list.message[0]: There is a statue depicting the new gods here...
Map001.Event[73].Page[0].list.message[1]: Someone has written "Save us" here with blood.
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[0]: There is a guest book one the table,
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[1]: "This nightmare has taken it's toll on me. I am
devolving into a something far lesser than the man
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[2]: "All the high morals and ethics have no value here.
The things I've done to survive..."
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[3]: "There is no place for a little miscreant like me in
the warmth of the sun anymore. I am a part of these dungeons
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[4]: "Part of this never-ending nightmare, just a one more
cog in this machine of fear and hunger..."
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[5]: "In a way I find it comforting. I have a definite place
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[6]: "But I am writing this here as a warning for anyone
who happens to step down to this darkness"
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[7]: "Do leave if it is still possible."
Map001.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[8]: You find a small booklet under the guest book,
you take the \c[2]Book of Fears\c[0] with you.

true name to you - the Black steel of the East.

Map001.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[1: The mysterious man looks like a war veteran almost. His
right arm seems to be missing and there is something very
Map001.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[4: "Not like we are going to run into each other ever again."
Map001.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[9: "You could call me... a veteran of these dungeons."
Map001.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[1: "Some time ago I found a manuscript concerning the ancient
"There were multiple pages that were maps of sorts..."
"I was able to locate few of the map locations and there
were buried treasures hidden where the marker was set."
"A couple of the maps are complete mystery to me however..."
"Maybe they're hidden somewhere so deep where I simply
couldn't get yet, or maybe there's something I'm missing."
"In any case, I'm done with this place. I've played with my
"I can sell you the maps, for say... \c[2]50 silver coins\c[0]."
"How do I know the maps are legit?"
"Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."
Map001.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[2: "Are you kidding me? I don't think so."
"I got no ways to prove my words. So yeah..."
"Ha! I've witnessed horror you couldn't even begin to
Map001.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[0: "I can sell you the maps, for \c[2]50 silver coins\c[0].
Map001.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[1: "How do I know the maps are legit?"
Map001.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[3: "Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."
Map001.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[7: "Are you kidding me? I don't think so."
Map001.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[8: "I got no ways to prove my words. So yeah..."
Map001.Event[252].Page[2].list.message[0: "You clearly don't take me seriously. So I'm done with you."
Map001.Event[252].Page[3].list.message[0: "Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."

Map001.Event[254].Page[0].list.message[1: "The hexen creates a connection to the gods, both new and
Map001.Event[254].Page[0].list.message[2: "To get closer to the older gods, you must work your way
up and gain their affinity. With each circle you get closer
Map001.Event[254].Page[0].list.message[3: "The new gods only pass on their knowledge to those who
share the same birth sign and soul with them."

Map001.Event[305].Page[0].list.message[0: Awful smell comes from all the rotten meat on
the table! Plates are covered with maggots.
Map001.Event[305].Page[0].list.message[1: It does make you wonder if someone actually eats this
stuff. After all, why have them here otherwise?
Map001.Event[305].Page[0].list.message[3: You take some \c[2]Rotten meat\c[0] with you.
It's soft and squishy, barely able to hold together.
Map001.Event[305].Page[0].list.message[4: One of the maggots runs up your arm.
